body_html: I think GradLoopState error is occured by this commit. This code makes no sense - because i think there's a lot of syntax error (ex: forward_ctxt is nowhere (did you meant forward_context?), grad_state and outer_grad_state is not defined.)
body_text: I think GradLoopState error is occured by this commit. This code makes no sense - because i think there's a lot of syntax error (ex: forward_ctxt is nowhere (did you meant forward_context?), grad_state and outer_grad_state is not defined.)
body: I think GradLoopState error is occured by this [commit](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/0ab76c2cf2b3a34f4cb985875512830aadea9afd). This code makes no sense - because i think there's a lot of syntax error (ex: `forward_ctxt` is nowhere (did you meant `forward_context`?), `grad_state` and `outer_grad_state` is not defined.)
